9 using namespace std;

11 class Point {
12 public:
13  Point(int r, int g, int b):
14  _r(r), _g(g), _b(b) {}
15  int _r, _g, _b;
16  double distance(const Point& p);
17  bool comp_lg(const Point& p);
18 };
19 
20 double Point::distance(const Point& p) {
21  return sqrt(pow(p._r - _r, 2) + pow(p._g - _g, 2) + pow(p._b - _b, 2));
22 }
23 
24 bool Point::comp_lg(const Point& p) {
25  // Component wise larger, true if self > p
26  return _r > p._r && _g > p._g && _b > p._g;
27 }
28 
29 bool operator<(const Point& p1, const Point& p2) {
30  if (p1._r != p2._r) return p1._r < p2._r;
31  if (p1._g != p2._g) return p1._g < p2._g;
32  return p1._b < p2._b;
33 }
34 
35 ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const Point& p) {
36  os << "{" << p._r << " " << p._g << " " << p._b << "} ";
37  return os;
38 }
39 
40 bool operator==(const Point& p1, const Point& p2) {
41  return p1._r == p2._r && p1._g == p2._g && p1._b == p2._b;
42 }
43 
44 namespace std {
45  template<> struct hash<Point> {
46  typedef Point argument_type;
47  typedef std::size_t result_type;
48  result_type operator()(argument_type const& p) const noexcept {
49  return p._r*256*256 + p._g*256 + p._b;
50  }
51  };
52 }
53 
54 class PointDifference {
55 public:
56  PointDifference(int r_, int g_, int b_):
57  r(r_), g(g_), b(b_) {}
58  int r,b,g;
59 };
60 
61 PointDifference operator-(const Point& p1, const Point& p2) {
62  PointDifference p(p1._r - p2._r, p1._g - p2._g, p1._b - p2._b);
63  return p;
64 }

66 struct Cluster {
67  list<int> point_indices;
68  Point min;
69  Point max;
70 };

72 class ColorspaceTool {
73 public:
74  ColorspaceTool(double distance_threshold, int cluster_count, double interpolation_threshold);
75  void load_colorspace_from_yaml(string filename);
76  void interpolate();
77  void save(string filename);
78  void cluster();
79 private:
80  vector<int> get_value_tuple(int index);
81  vector<int> get_colorspace_points(vector<int>);
82  void generate_interpolated_points(Point p1, Point p2);
83  void all_distances();
84  void build_main_cluster();
85  void merge_clusters();
86  double get_distance(int p_index1, int p_index2);

88  vector<Point> _points;
89  double _distance_threshold;
90  int _cluster_count;
91  double _interpolation_threshold;
92  vector<vector<double>> _distances;
93  vector<Cluster> _clusters;
94  list<int> _main_cluster;
95  unordered_set<Point> _interpolated_points;

98 ColorspaceTool::ColorspaceTool(double distance_threshold,
99  int cluster_count,
100  double interpolation_threshold):
101  _distance_threshold(distance_threshold),
102  _cluster_count(cluster_count),
103  _interpolation_threshold(interpolation_threshold) {}
104 
105 void ColorspaceTool::load_colorspace_from_yaml(string filename) {
106  cout << "Loading from " << filename << endl;
107  ifstream file(filename);
108  if (file.is_open()) {
109  YAML::Node colorfile = YAML::Load(file);
110  file.close();
111  YAML::Node content = colorfile["color_values"]["greenField"];
112  YAML::Node yred = content["red"];
113  YAML::Node ygreen = content["green"];
114  YAML::Node yblue = content["blue"];
115  for (int i = 0; i < yred.size(); ++i) {
116  int r = yred[i].as<int>();
117  int g = ygreen[i].as<int>();
118  int b = yblue[i].as<int>();
119  Point p(r, g, b);
120  _points.push_back(p);
121  }
122  }
123  cout << _points.size() << endl;
124 }
125 
126 double ColorspaceTool::get_distance(int p_index1, int p_index2) {
127  return _distances[p_index2][p_index1];
128 }
129 
130 void ColorspaceTool::all_distances() {
131  _distances = vector<vector<double>>(_points.size());
132  fill(_distances.begin(), _distances.end(), vector<double>(_points.size()));
133  for (int i = 0; i < _points.size(); ++i) {
134  for (int j = 0; j < i; ++j) {
135  double d = _points[i].distance(_points[j]);
136  _distances[i][j] = d;
137  _distances[j][i] = d;
138  }
139  }
140 }
141 
142 void ColorspaceTool::cluster() {
143  cout << "Calculating distances" << endl;
144  all_distances();
145  cout << "Start making sets" << endl;
146  for (int i = 0; i < _distances.size(); ++i) {
147  list<int> threshold_distance_indices;
148  int rmin = 255, gmin = 255, bmin = 255,
149  rmax = 0, gmax = 0, bmax = 0;
150  for (int j = 0; j < _distances.size(); ++j) {
151  if (get_distance(i, j) < _distance_threshold) {
152  threshold_distance_indices.push_back(j);
153  if (_points[j]._r < rmin) rmin = _points[j]._r;
154  if (_points[j]._r > rmax) rmax = _points[j]._r;
155  if (_points[j]._g < gmin) gmin = _points[j]._g;
156  if (_points[j]._g > gmax) gmax = _points[j]._g;
157  if (_points[j]._b < bmin) bmin = _points[j]._b;
158  if (_points[j]._b > bmax) bmax = _points[j]._b;
159  }
160  }
161  Point min(rmin, gmin, bmin), max(rmax, gmax, bmax);
162  Cluster c = {threshold_distance_indices, min, max};
163  _clusters.push_back(c);
164  }
165  merge_clusters();
166  build_main_cluster();
167 }
168 
169 void ColorspaceTool::merge_clusters() {
170  cout << "Merging sets" << endl;
171  for (auto it1 = _clusters.begin(); it1 != _clusters.end(); ++it1) {
172  for (auto it2 = _clusters.begin(); it2 != _clusters.end(); ++it2) {
173  // Merging only necessary when cluster1.max > cluster2.min
174  if (!it1->point_indices.empty() && !it2->point_indices.empty() && it1 != it2
175  && !(it1->min.comp_lg(it2->max) && it2->min.comp_lg(it1->max))) {
176  for (auto& element: it2->point_indices) {
177  // Lists are sorted, binary search can be used
178  if (binary_search(it1->point_indices.begin(),
179  it1->point_indices.end(),
180  element)) {
181  it1->point_indices.merge(it2->point_indices);
182  it1->point_indices.unique();
183  break;
184  }
185  }
186  }
187  }
188  }
189 }
190 
191 void ColorspaceTool::build_main_cluster() {
192  // Sort clusters descending by size
193  std::sort(_clusters.begin(), _clusters.end(), [&](Cluster c1, Cluster c2) { return c1.point_indices.size() > c2.point_indices.size(); });
194  // Build main cluster
195  int i = 0;
196  auto it = _clusters.begin();
197  while (i < _cluster_count && it != _clusters.end()) {
198  _main_cluster.merge(it->point_indices);
199  i++;
200  it++;
201  }
202  _main_cluster.unique();
203 }
204 
205 void ColorspaceTool::interpolate() {
206  cout << "Interpolating points" << endl;
207  for (auto outer_index = _main_cluster.begin(); outer_index != _main_cluster.end(); ++outer_index) {
208  for (auto inner_index = next(outer_index); inner_index != _main_cluster.end(); ++inner_index) {
209  if (get_distance(*outer_index, *inner_index) < _interpolation_threshold) {
210  generate_interpolated_points(_points[*outer_index], _points[*inner_index]);
211  }
212  }
213  }
214 }
215 
216 void ColorspaceTool::generate_interpolated_points(Point p1, Point p2) {
217  if (p1 < p2) std::swap(p1, p2);
218  PointDifference difference = p1 - p2;
219  int max = difference.r;
220  if (difference.g > max) max = difference.g;
221  if (difference.b > max) max = difference.b;
222  for (int i = 0; i <= max; ++i) {
223  int r = p2._r + int(float(difference.r)/max * i);
224  int g = p2._g + int(float(difference.g)/max * i);
225  int b = p2._b + int(float(difference.b)/max * i);
226  Point p(r,g,b);
227  _interpolated_points.insert(p);
228  }
229 }
230 
231 void ColorspaceTool::save(string filename) {
232  cout << "Saving to " << filename << endl;
233  ofstream file(filename);
234  std::vector<int> red, blue, green;
235  for (auto point: _interpolated_points) {
236  red.push_back(point._r);
237  green.push_back(point._g);
238  blue.push_back(point._b);
239  }
240  YAML::Emitter out;
241  out << YAML::BeginMap << YAML::Key << "color_values" << YAML::Value
242  << YAML::BeginMap << YAML::Key << "greenField" << YAML::Value
243  << YAML::BeginMap << YAML::Key << "red"
244  << YAML::Value << YAML::Flow << YAML::BeginSeq;
245  for (auto i: red) {
246  out << i;
247  }
248  out << YAML::EndSeq << YAML::Block << YAML::Key << "green"
249  << YAML::Value << YAML::Flow << YAML::BeginSeq;
250  for (auto i: green) {
251  out << i;
252  }
253  out << YAML::EndSeq << YAML::Block << YAML::Key << "blue"
254  << YAML::Value << YAML::Flow << YAML::BeginSeq;
255  for (auto i: blue) {
256  out << i;
257  }
258  out << YAML::EndSeq << YAML::Flow << YAML::EndMap << YAML::EndMap << YAML::EndMap;
259  file << out.c_str();
260 }
261 
262 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
263  if (argc == 1) {
264  cerr << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " colorspace.yaml [-it interpolation-threshold] [-cc cluster-count] [-ct cluster-threshold] [-o out.yaml]" << endl;
265  return 1;
266  }
267  string filename, output = "out.yaml";
268  double interpolation_threshold = 10.0, cluster_threshold = 3.0;
269  int cluster_count = 3;
270  for (int i = 1; i < argc; ++i) {
271  string arg = string(argv[i]);
272  if (arg == "-o") {
273  i++;
274  output = argv[i];
275  } else if (arg == "-it") {
276  i++;
277  interpolation_threshold = stod(argv[i]);
278  } else if (arg == "-cc") {
279  i++;
280  cluster_count = stoi(argv[i]);
281  } else if (arg == "-ct") {
282  i++;
283  cluster_threshold = stod(argv[i]);
284  } else {
285  filename = argv[i];
286  }
287  }
288  if (filename.empty()) {
289  cerr << "Please specify an input file" << endl;
290  return 1;
291  }
292  ColorspaceTool tool(cluster_threshold, cluster_count, interpolation_threshold);
293  tool.load_colorspace_from_yaml(filename);
294  tool.cluster();
295  tool.interpolate();
296  tool.save(output);
297 }
